amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for AARGM Counter Air Defense Future Capabilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 439 printed in Part B of House Report 111-233 to prohibit funding for AARGM Counter Air Defense Future Capabilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 78 - 348, 10 Present (Roll no. 668).
